name: AloneGuy
description:
You find yourself on a small deserted island with a lonely palm tree, there are only evil crabs around and they are trying to bite you off with their claws, be careful and dodge in time!

AloneGuy - A game in which you have to control the character on a small island, you can jump in four directions and if you make all your efforts, you can adjust to the rhythm of the game and jump over the pesky crabs in time.

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Reaction training
- Difficulty
